title: GENERAL
fullText:
Pre-assembled battery systems shall not be installed in locations where they will be exposed to temperatures lower than the minimum or greater than the maximum temperatures, as specified by the pre-assembled battery system manufacturer.
The pre-assembled battery system shall be selected and installed to provide protection against damage that might reasonably be expected from the presence of water, high humidity, dust, vermin or solar radiation (direct sunlight).
Pre-assembled battery systems should be installed in locations that avoid localized or general heat sources (such as sunlight, generators, steam pipes, hot water systems, air conditioners, space heaters and against uninsulated walls heated from direct sunlight). The flow of heated air from any appliance should be directed away from, and not impact on, the pre-assembled battery systems.
A pre-assembled battery system should not be located near combustible materials.
